mapper.select: SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(hydu.reg_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, count(hydu.user_id) total_num FROM huiyingdai_users hydu LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(hydu.reg_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name

SELECT date_format(ac.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name, count(hydu.user_id) total_num FROM huiyingdai_users hydu LEFT JOIN hyjf_bank_open_account ac ON ac.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = date_format(ac.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydu.bank_open_account = 1 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name

SELECT day, source_id, source_name, count(user_id) total_num FROM ( SELECT date_format(bc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name, hydu.user_id FROM huiyingdai_users hydu INNER JOIN hyjf_bank_card bc ON hydu.user_id = bc.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = date_format(bc.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND bc.`status` = 1 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY hydu.user_id ) tempt GROUP BY source_name

SELECT day, source_id, source_name, count(user_id) total_num FROM ( SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(r.create_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, r.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_account_recharge r JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON r.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON r.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = r.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = r.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(r.create_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY r.user_id ) recharge_temp GROUP BY source_name

SELECT day, source_id, source_name, count(user_id) total_num FROM ( SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(r.create_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, r.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_account_recharge r JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON r.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON r.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = r.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = r.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(hydu.reg_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(r.create_time) ) AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY r.user_id ) recharge_temp GROUP BY source_name

SELECT day, source_id, source_name, COUNT(user_id) total_num FROM ( SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime)) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.add_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(t.add_time)) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM hyjf_debt_plan_accede t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM hyjf_debt_credit_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND t.del_flag = 1 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY t.user_id ) tempt GROUP BY source_name

SELECT day, source_id, source_name, COUNT(user_id) total_num FROM ( SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(hydu.reg_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND #{statisticDay} = DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime)) AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.add_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(hydu.reg_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND #{statisticDay} = DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(t.add_time)) AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM hyjf_debt_plan_accede t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(hydu.reg_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM hyjf_debt_credit_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE t.del_flag = 1 AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(hydu.reg_time) ) AND #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) GROUP BY t.user_id ) tempt GROUP BY source_name

SELECT day, source_id, source_name, COUNT(user_id) total_num FROM ( SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime)) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.addtime < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.add_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM hyjf_debt_plan_accede t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM hyjf_debt_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND del_flag = 1 AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.add_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(t.add_time)) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.addtime < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.add_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM hyjf_debt_plan_accede t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM hyjf_debt_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND del_flag = 1 AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM hyjf_debt_plan_accede t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.addtime < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.add_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM hyjf_debt_plan_accede t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM hyjf_debt_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND del_flag = 1 AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM hyjf_debt_credit_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE t.del_flag = 1 AND #{statisticDay} = DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.create_time) ) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.addtime < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.add_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM hyjf_debt_plan_accede t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t1.user_id FROM hyjf_debt_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND del_flag = 1 AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(#{statisticDay}) ) GROUP BY t.user_id ) tempt GROUP BY source_name

SELECT day, source_id, source_name, COUNT(user_id) total_num FROM ( SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime)) AND hydu.reg_time >= 1490544000 AND hydui.attribute = 0 AND ( hydup.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' OR hacsd.source_name LIKE '%投之家推广%' ) AND ( ( SELECT count(t1.user_id) FROM huiyingdai_borrow_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.addtime < unix_timestamp(CONCAT(#{statisticDay},' 23:59:59')) ) + ( SELECT count(t1.user_id) FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.add_time < unix_timestamp(CONCAT(#{statisticDay},' 23:59:59')) ) + ( SELECT count(t1.user_id) FROM hyjf_debt_plan_accede t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(CONCAT(#{statisticDay},' 23:59:59')) ) + ( SELECT count(t1.user_id) FROM hyjf_debt_credit_tender t1 WHERE t1.user_id = t.user_id AND t1.create_time < unix_timestamp(CONCAT(#{statisticDay},' 23:59:59')) AND del_flag = 1 ) ) > 1 GROUP BY t.user_id UNION SELECT DATE( FROM_UNIXTIME(t.add_time) ) day, IFNULL( hydup.source_id, hacsd.source_id ) source_id, t.user_id, IFNULL( hydup.source_name, hacsd.source_name ) source_name FROM huiyingdai_credit_tender t JOIN huiyingdai_users hydu ON t.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_users_info hydui ON hydu.user_id = hydui.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_reg hydur ON hydur.user_id = hydu.user_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm hydutm ON hydur.utm_id = hydutm.utm_id LEFT JOIN huiyingdai_utm_plat hydup ON hydup.source_id = hydutm.source_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_app_channel_statistics_detail hacsd ON hacsd.user_id = hydu.user_id WHERE #{statisticDay} = DATE(FROM_UNIXTIME(t.add_time)) AND hydu.reg_time
